title: What Happened on Mars? - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/25/18
itunes:title: What Happened on Mars? - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/25/18
description:
George Noory and space expert Mark Bara examine the discovery of liquid water under the surface of Mars, what could have created an asteroid belt near the planet, and even work to debunk conspiracy theories that mankind never landed on the moon.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
